white: Putting Jaune in a dress and pegging his butt.
Sending a Welsh corgi in the mail.
Getting kicked in the face with Mercury's rocket legs.
"the Times I Saved Jaune: an Anthology" by: Pyrrha Nikos.
Sun struggling to NOT break the 4th wall.
Weiss freezing the swimming-pool so she can practise ice-skating.
Jaune Arc's Spanish cousin, Juane Arc.
Beacon proving its progressiveness by installing litterboxes for faunus students.
That time Yang's mom went out for cigarettes and never came back.
DMND, a Nigerian knockoff of RWBY.
The burning wreck of S. S. Arkos.
Being part of a cult or something.
Ruining Junior's life on a weekly basis.
The secret vibration function on Yang's prosthetic arm.
This game of emotions we play.
Being cryptic and enigmatic just to mess with students and staff.
One brick of Vacuan black-dust heroin.
Giving Blake a ball of yarn to play with.
The guns built into Mercury's bionic feet.
Ruby learning about the changes in her body.
Tipping Adam Taurus over when he's asleep.
All of the hair product used by Team SSSN.
Using a swordfish as an actual sword.
The vise-like grip of Glynda's thighs.
The button in Ozpin's office that only he knows the purpose of.
The brightest banana in the bunch.
The oddly phallic looking chair at Ozpin's desk.
One tentacle shy of being a completely in a completely different genre of anime.
Using hypnotism to relieve Yang of her phantom limb-pain.
Penny's last process before her death.
Seven Beowolves in heat, at a minimum.
Yang having more cleavage than a flawless diamond.
A chainsaw chaingun with a long sharpened chain of ammo.
Blake purring while Yang scratches just behind her cat-ears.
Stealing the last life-jacket from Neptune.
Inquiring about the age-of-consent in Remnant for "reasons".
The countless hours of Faunus labor used to make this deck.
Ruby cumming rose-petals all over Weiss' face.
Getting punched through two concrete pillars.
That motorcycle that Yang used, like, twice.
Making Port & Oobleck dress as plumbers for halloween.
Getting your monologue interrupted by a hungry grimm.
Getting beat up by a little girl.
Pyrrha Nikos using her polarity to control your pole.
A very large beowolf just around the corner.
Trying to find chess pieces in the middle of a forest.
That one lamppost Zwei peed on.
Blake seeing Ed Elric from behind and mistaking him for Yang.
That board-game Team RWBY played in the library.
The secret erotica shelves in the back room of Tukson's Book Trade.
Yang & Blake's daughter from the future.
Getting kicked in the nuts by Coco.
Popping popcorn with your own fingers.
Accidentally setting the mood when rose-petals fall out of your cape.
A coffee drinking contest between Ozpin and Oobleck.
Spraying Blake with a water-bottle to house-break her.
The secret "vibrate" function on Glynda's riding crop.
Yanking on Velvet's ears to see if they're real.
Blake getting gangbanged by Sun's clones.
A class-action lawsuit against the Schnee Dust Company.
The tiny, tired hands of the faunus child who made this card.
Getting shoved into a rocket propelled locker.
The toughest bread you'll ever see.
Oobleck getting whiplash simply by moving.
Donating all of Weiss' allowance to a Faunus Lives Matter fundraiser.
Finding out Neo's full name is actually Neosporin.
Neo disguised as a sexy nurse.
Using Velvet's camera and semblance to copy sex-positions.
Whatever the hell is in Ozpin's mug.
Watching Ruby waste away from lung-cancer after inhaling some of Pyrrha's ashes.
Qrow, Glynda & Ruby getting bitched at by Edna Mode for wearing capes.
Tai naming his daughter after himself in a rare moment of narcissism.
Throwing a declined credit card like a fucking shuriken.
Teaching Penny about the birds and the bees.
